DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the effects of patupilone on the pharmacokinetics of warfarin in patients with advanced malignancies.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluate the Effects of Patupilone on the Pharmacokinetics and Pharmacodynamics of Warfarin in Patients With Advanced Malignancies
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria Age ≥ 18 years of age Life expectancy ≥3 months Histologically documented advanced solid tumors which have progressed after standard systemic therapy or for which standard systemic therapy does not exist Agents containing warfarin or heparin must be discontinued 7 days prior to enrollment in the study Exclusion criteria History of/or active bleeding disorders Known hypersensitivity to warfarin or related compounds The use of vitamin K Central lines that require anticoagulant maintenance The use of agents containing warfarin and heparin Known diagnosis of human immunodeficiency virus (HIV) infection, hepatitis Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criteria may apply
